text: Zalman King (May 23, 1942 â€“ February 3, 2012) was an American movie writer, producer, movie director and actor. He directed several erotic movies, including Wild Orchid (1990) and Two Moon Junction (1988). King was born in Trenton, New Jersey. He died from cancer in Santa Monica, California. title: Zalman King
